item.title: Fancy interactive tables with reactable in R
item.description: Creating visually appealing tables and visualizations is an asset for any data analyst, especially when the findings have to be presented to the stakeholders or, in general, to a broad audience. In this way, R has some libraries that make this really simple. That is the case with reactable library, which makes it very easy to design very attractive interactive tables. Iâ€™ll be using this library along with reactablefmtr, which adds even more functionalities to create these tables.
